content.original: Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. On a Critical Hit, the Pressurized Container will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.prevOriginal: Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. On a Critical Hit, the Pressurized Container will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.content: 弹药舱包含射弹武器所需的弹药,每种武器类型至少需要一个弹舱.当受到严重损伤时,高压容器会爆炸,对安装部位造成伤害.使用C.A.S.E.可以降低风险.
